info.desc: Matrix computations, conditioning/stability, direct methods for linear systems, classical iterative methods: Jacobi, Gauss-Seidel; modern iterative methods, Arnoldi decomposition, GMRES and other Krylov subspace-based methods for sparse and structured matrices; numerical solution of eigenvalue problems,  implementation using suitable programming language, application to differential equations/optimization problems.
info.name: Numerical Linear Algebra (Honours)
